mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, VIEWS, STATUS, DETAIL_STATUS, LIKES FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE IN ('C','S','A','M') ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, VIEWS, STATUS, DETAIL_STATUS, LIKES FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, VIEWS, STATUS, DETAIL_STATUS, LIKES FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = 'E' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, USER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, VIEWS, STATUS, DETAIL_STATUS, LIKES FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = 'I' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRICE, QTY, CONTENT, STATUS, LIKES, IMG FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC
